Job Description

We are seeking a Bilingual Spanish HR Assistant to join our team! You will be responsible for providing administrative support to the HR department.

Responsibilities:

  • Assist with recruiting and hiring efforts
  • Maintain personnel records, in compliance with HR regulations
  • Compile reports from personnel databases
  • Review and update HR information system records
  • Enforce company policies, rules and regulations
  • Communicate all relevant information to employees and job applicants

Qualifications:

  • Previous experience in Human Resources
  • General knowledge of labor and employment laws
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Strong organizational skills
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Bilingual Spanish a MUST

Company Description

Decore-ative Specialties is a family owned custom cabinet component manufacturer that has been in business for over 55 years. We are a leading manufacturer in this industry. We offer a comprehensive benefits package, including; paid time off, medical benefits, 401K, etc. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.
